mapper.select: select gcbh,wzfl,jldw,tpxe,bcxe,sjyy,wzyy,sgyy,cdjz,wxyy,qlj,cldy,lysl,xesl from ( select gcbh,wzfl,jldw,sum(tpxe) tpxe,sum(bcxe) bcxe,sum(sjyy) sjyy,sum(wzyy) wzyy,sum(sgyy) sgyy, sum(cdjz) cdjz,sum(wxyy) wxyy,sum(qlj) qlj,sum(cldy) cldy,sum(lysl) lysl,sum(xesl) xesl, wzflbh =(case wzfl when '板材' then '00' when '型材' then '01' when '管材' then '02' when '油漆' then '03' when '电缆' then '04' when '焊材' then '05' else '99' end) from ( select gcbh,wzfl,jldw,case when define00 ='托盘限额' then xesl else 0 end as tpxe, case when define00 ='补充限额' then xesl else 0 end as bcxe, case when define00 in ('A类设计错误','B类设计错误','详设原因','补充设计') then xesl else 0 end as sjyy, case when define00 ='设备错误' then xesl else 0 end as wzyy, case when define00 ='施工原因' then xesl else 0 end as sgyy, case when define00 ='船东加帐' then xesl else 0 end as cdjz, case when define00 ='外协原因' then xesl else 0 end as wxyy, case when define00 ='缺料件' then xesl else 0 end as qlj, case when define00 ='材料代用' then xesl else 0 end as cldy,lysl,xesl from ( select gcbh,gcmc,wzfl,xelx,wzbh,wzmc,wzms,jldw,define00,xesl, isnull((select sum(sfs) from V_Mat_MatRequisition where xeid =xeb.id),0) lysl from V_Mat_MatQuato where gcbh =#{projNo})A )B group by wzfl,jldw,gcbh )C where tpxe+bcxe+sjyy+wzyy+sgyy+cdjz+wxyy+qlj>0 order by wzflbh
